entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
